pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Accurate kNN Implementation with Multiple Distance Measures // Similarly to the 'FNN' package, this package allows calculation of the k nearest neighbors (kNN) of a data matrix. The implementation is based on cover trees introduced by Alina Beygelzimer, Sham Kakade, and John Langford (2006) doi:10.1145/1143844.1143857.
